'''Avenging Squall''' is an [[Character Card Elemental Skill|Elemental Skill]] for [[Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard (Character Card)|Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

This skill is executed automatically 1 turn after [[Gathering the Winds]].
